Colin Powell endorses Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell Lisa Murkowskiounced Sunday that he will be voting for Sen. Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the inclusive nature of his campaign. "I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Sen. Barack Obama ," Colin Powell said
